name: groooooow
description:
„groooooow“…

…is a tiny ant colony simulator that was created during the 8th HAW GameJam.

Story

Gustav did not know what was coming for him. After a delicious lunch on an idyllic meadow, he laid down for a quick nap. Not aware that he picked the wrong spot for his picnic blanket.

Now it is your turn! Empty the space to clear the way back to your home. Assemble your ant friends by consuming the leftover treats. But be careful, some spots might not be very ant friendly. The more companions you have gather the easier it will be.

Movement

  • Use the mouse to navigate your ant colony
  • Hit esc if you want to go back to the main menu
